properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:47AM PST until February 9 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations around one inch.
Areas of northeast winds increasing to 20 to 35 mph with gusts
to 55 mph. Local gusts to 60 mph are possible the eastern
portion near the Los Angeles County line.

* WHERE...Ventura County Mountains.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 PM PST this evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong
winds could cause tree damage. Travel could affected on some
mountain roadways including Highway 33 in Ventura County.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling
1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
